official_title: Pilot Study of Dynamic Contrast Enhanced Computed Tomography (DCE-CT) Imaging for the Assessment of Radiation Therapy Outcome for Liver Cancer Patients
inclusion_criteria:
1. Provision to sign and date the consent form
2. Stated willingness to comply with all study procedures and be available for the duration of the study
3. Be a Male or Female aged 18-100
4. Diagnosed with Liver HCC or metastases
5. Must be receiving or will plan to receive SBRT for Liver HCC or metastases
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
Must have maximum age of 100 Years
exclusion_criteria:
1. Allergy to iodine contrast
2. CT with contrast not offered as a Standard of Care
3. Pregnant women
